animeTitle: Mouryou no Hako: Chuuzenji Atsuko no Jikenbo - Hako no Yurei no Koto
animeDescription: A side story that reveals the investigative notes that Atsuko, the younger sister of the main character Akihiko Chuzenji, wrote about the brutal dismembering incidents in the main story.(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Nakamura, Ryousuke', 'Director'], ['Nightmare', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['CLAMP', 'Original Character Design'], ['Nishida, Asako', 'Character Design']]
